package Lec20;

public class Print_Dec_INC {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		PDI(5);
	}

	public static void PDI(int n) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if (n == 0) {
			return;
		}
		System.out.println(n);
		PDI(n - 1);
		System.out.println(n);

	}

}
